cols.caption: Not avail. on short term
cols.description: Color to use when flagging sale order lines where the current stock minus foreseeable shipments is not sufficient to fulfill the ordered quantity.

cols.caption: Line No
cols.description: Unique line for this document

cols.description: Product, Service, Item

cols.description: Attribute Instances for Products

cols.caption: Quantity
cols.description: The Quantity Entered is based on the selected UoM

cols.caption: Available at short notice
cols.description: Current stock minus foreseeable shipments in the respective product's stocking UOM.

cols.caption: UOM
cols.description: Unit of Measure

cols.caption: Price
cols.description: Price Entered - the price based on the selected/base UoM

cols.caption: Invoicing based on
cols.description: Legt fest wie die abrechenbare Menge ermittelt wird, wenn die tatsächlich gelieferte Menge von der mominal gelieferten Menge abweicht.

cols.caption: Quantity in Price Unit
cols.description: Menge in Preiseinheit

cols.caption: Discount %
cols.description: Discount in percent

cols.caption: Net Price
cols.description: Actual Price

cols.caption: Line Amount
cols.description: Line Extended Amount (Quantity * Actual Price) without Freight and Charges

cols.caption: Ertrag netto
cols.description: Effektiver Preis pro Einheit, minus erwartetem Skonto und vertraglicher Rückerstattung.

cols.caption: Marge %
cols.description: Differenz zwischen VK Ertrag und EK Ertrag.

cols.caption: List Price
cols.description: List Price

cols.caption: Tax
cols.description: Tax identifier

cols.caption: No Price Conditions Indicator
cols.description: Red means that mandatory pricing conditions are missing; yellow means that temporary pricing conditions were created just for the respective position.

cols.description: Die Bedingungen für die Bezahlung dieses Vorgangs
